title: WTB New Hampshire Baseball postcards, ephemera
author: JElwell

posts.post_title: WTB New Hampshire Baseball postcards, ephemera
posts.post_content: ISO Postcards, news clippings, photos and any ephemera relating to baseball as played in New Hampshire pre 1970, especially Portsmouth -- school teams, beer leagues, town & industrial teams, Barnstorm games, etc. Let me know what you've got.
